bibl.bibl: Loring, Charles Greely. 1864. England’s liability for indemnity: remarks on the letter of ‘Historicus’ [William Vernon Harcourt]dated November 4th, 1863; printed in the London ‘Times’, November 7th; and reprinted in the ‘Boston Daily Advertiser’, November 25th. Boston, Mass.: W. V. Spencer.
